name: EcoCart
subtitle: Smart Plastic Collection & Recycling
description:
EcoCart revolutionizes plastic recycling by connecting collectors with recycling points. Earn eco-credits for your contributions to a cleaner planet. Features include:

• Smart Collection Routes
• Real-time Recycling Points
• Eco-credits Rewards
• Community Challenges
• Progress Tracking
• Environmental Impact Stats
